verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H702>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1867>Darius,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> in the <S%H702>fourth<s%> day of the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> even in <S%H3691>Chisleu;<s%>

When they had <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto the house of <S%H1008>God<s%> <S%H8272>Sherezer<s%> and <S%H7278>Regem-melech,<s%> and their <S%H376>men,<s%> to <S%H2470>pray<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%>

And to <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Should I <S%H1058>weep<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> separating <S%H5144>myself,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> so <S%H4100>many<s%> <S%H8141>years?<s%>
Then <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> ye <S%H6684>fasted<s%> and <S%H5594>mourned<s%> in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> and <S%H7637>seventh<s%> month, even <S%H2088>those<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> did ye at all <S%H6684>fast<s%> <S%H6684><s%> unto me, even to <S%H589>me?<s%>

And <S%H3588>when<s%> ye did <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H3588>when<s%> ye did <S%H8354>drink,<s%> did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> for yourselves, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> for yourselves?

Should ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> when <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> and in <S%H7961>prosperity,<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%> her, when men <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> the <S%H5045>south<s%> and the <S%H8219>plain?<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>speaketh<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8199>Execute<s%> <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H7356>compassions<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H854>to<s%> his brother: <S%H251><s%>

And <S%H6231>oppress<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H490>widow,<s%> nor the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> nor the <S%H6041>poor;<s%> and let <S%H408>none<s%> of you <S%H2803>imagine<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H376><s%> against his <S%H251>brother<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

But they <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7181>hearken,<s%> and <S%H5414>pulled<s%> <S%H5637>away<s%> the <S%H3802>shoulder,<s%> and <S%H3513>stopped<s%> their <S%H241>ears,<s%> that they should not <S%H4480>hear.<s%> <S%H8085><s%>

Yea, they <S%H7760>made<s%> their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> as an adamant <S%H8068>stone,<s%> lest they should <S%H4480>hear<s%> <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853>the<s%> <S%H8451>law,<s%> and the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> in his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5030>prophets:<s%> therefore <S%H1961>came<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

Therefore it is come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H834>as<s%> he <S%H7121>cried,<s%> and they would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H7121>cried,<s%> and I would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%>

But I scattered them with a <S%H5590>whirlwind<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%> Thus the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, that no man passed <S%H4480>through<s%> <S%H5674><s%> nor <S%H4480>returned:<s%> <S%H7725><s%> for they <S%H7760>laid<s%> the <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8047>desolate.<s%>
